greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number A(n,k) of permutations p of [n] without fixed points such that p^k = Id; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Antidiagonals n = 0..140, flattened
formula: E.g.f. of column k: exp(Sum_{d|k, d>1} x^d/d).
mathematica: A[0, 0] = A[0, 1] = 1; A[_, 0|1] = 0; A[n_, k_] := A[n, k] = If[n < 0, 0, If[n == 0, 1, Sum[Product[n - i, {i, 1, j - 1}]*A[n - j, k], {j, Rest @ Divisors[k]}]]]; Table[A[n, d - n], {d, 0, 14}, {n, 0, d}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 21 2017, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 18 2015
